attributes.action: Bank Crisis - Nationalize all banks who fail without prejudice or preference
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To PM & Government (without Prejudice)

Upon hearing the "news" that another Bank Insurance Bail-out is planed today with yet more Tax payers money;

I am shocked Surely this rewards (again) the "questionable" CEO's and heads etc at the Banks; this action was not performed with other retail companies.

Why not follow the Irish Goverments brave / Shining example of how to handle a banking crisis;

Nationalize all banks who fail without prejudice or preference.

it is after all Tax Payers money so profits should be fed back to the NHS, Fireservice, Civil communities etc. Ie it should be returned to the people.

Best wishes and regards

e

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
